works.description: A blog post located at the URL below and titled 25 e-commerce mega menus dissected written by Matt Clarke, E-commerce Manager at Swell Uk and a guest blogger on Econsultancy. Be advised that NONE of the content on Econsultancy.com is to be used on commercial pages without written approval from Econsultancy. Therefore, the use of the Econsultancy content as above in a commercialand publicly accessible way is illegal under copyright law and forbidden under our agreed terms of use.
